displaytitle: Madonna and Child with Saints Francis and Bernardino
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Felix Warburg in memory of her husband
inscribed: Inscription on frame below: "Sanctus Franciscus-Pulcra eset decora filia yerusalem-Sanctus Bernardinus (Seal at either end of inscription.)

titles.title: Madonna and Child with Saints Francis and Bernardino

makers.displaymaker: formerly attributed to Matteo di Giovanni, Italian, active ca. 1452 - 1495

texts.textentryhtml: Mrs. Felix Warburg; 1941 gift to Princeton University Art Museum.

caption: Guidoccio Cozzarelli (Italian, 1450–1516), formerly attributed to Matteo di Giovanni (Italian, active ca. 1452 - 1495), Madonna and Child with Saints Francis and Bernardino, 1483.
